transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello
Customer: Haan ji sir.
Executive: Ji ji India Mart se?
Customer: Haan ji, bataiye sir.
Customer: Madam ye tumne de rakha hai India Mart se de rakha hai.
Executive: Okay, okay.
Customer: Madam isme humne bola tha 10000 se upar ka 10000 se niche ka dikha raha hai buyer ka.
Executive: Aapki company ka naam bataiye sir?
Customer: Bather Industries.

Executive: Bather Industries se baat kar rahe ho na?
Customer: Haan. Aap paanch minute dijiye main aapki account manager se connect kara rahi hu aapka, theek hai? Is number pe karaana mere number pe.
Executive: Aap mere ko bata do kis number pe karaana hai? Do number de rakhe hai maine is number 9414433428 pe kara.
Executive: Ek second rukiye main dekh leti hu number ye mere paas hai kya 94 wala.


Executive: 428 hai jisme end mein us pe karaana hai?
Customer: Haan ji?
Executive: Jisme end mein 428 hai us pe karaana hai?
Customer: Us pe is pe baat karo.
Executive: Achha, theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Showing buyleads below 10000 instead of above.

- Wants to connect with account manager.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed the company name.

- Executive agreed to connect with account manager.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will connect the call.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, account manager, connect call
